name: XCTSourceCodeContext
desc: An object that contains call stack and source code location details to provide context for a point of execution in a test.

items.name: init(callStack: [XCTSourceCodeFrame], location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a provided call stack and source code location.

items.name: init(callStackAddresses: [NSNumber], location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with an array of call stack addresses and a source code location.

items.name: init(location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?)
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a call stack from the executing thread and a provided source code location.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes a new instance with a call stack from the executing thread and no location.

items.name: var callStack: [XCTSourceCodeFrame]
items.desc: An array of source code frames that describes the call stack when a test issue occurs.

items.name: var location: XCTSourceCodeLocation?
items.desc: A representation of a location in source code where a test issue occurred.
